title: Marjoram Spanish Essential Oil
description: Pure and natural Spanish Marjoram is used in aromatherapy for its soothing, calming properties for the mind and soul.
cleaned_text: The plant is actually wild growing thyme, but is known as Spanish Marjoram. It is used in aromatherapy for its soothing, calming properties. Pregnant women should avoid using this oil.Uses of Marjoram Spanish Essential Oil SpainHistory and Background In Chinese medicine, warm/dry energy, earth/fire element, tonifies and circulates Qi, clears cold phlegm, calms mind, restores Spleen-pancreas Qi to balance. Calms obsessive thinking, promotes self-nurturing, and helps accept deep loss and grief. Effective in balancing the energy currents flowing, euphoric and effective on the 3rd and 4th chakras. In Ancient times the Romans crowned newlywed couples with wreaths made from the plant as a symbol of love, honor, and happiness, while the tea made from it was often used by singers to soothe and preserve their voice.Physical Description Thin Consistency, pale yellow or amber in color.Aromatic Description Fresh, herbaceous, warm, camphoraceous, sweet, and slightly woody of dried flowering herbs.Information for Aromatherapists Marjoram Spanish essential oil is a middle to top note and blends well with Lavender, Rosemary, Bergamot, Chamomile, Cypress, cedarwood, Tea Tree and Eucalyptus. Our Marjoram Spanish essential oil is 100% pure and natural.
